import React from 'react'; import { Chart as ChartJS, CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement, Filler, } from 'chart.js'; import { Bar, Doughnut, Line, Pie } from 'react-chartjs-2'; import Card from '../UI/Card'; import Badge from '../UI/Badge'; import { TrendingUp, Users, Clock, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, XCircle, Target, Zap, Calendar, Award, Activity, BarChart3, PieChart, LineChart } from 'lucide-react'; ChartJS.register( CategoryScale, LinearScale, BarElement, Title, Tooltip, Legend, ArcElement, PointElement, LineElement, Filler ); const ProjectAnalytics = ({ analytics, projectName, isLoading = false }) => { // Helper function to format duration const formatDuration = (days, minutes) => { if (!days && !minutes) return 'N/A'; const daysInt = Math.floor(days); const hours = Math.floor((days - daysInt) * 24); const mins = Math.floor(minutes % 60); if (daysInt > 0) { return `${daysInt}d ${hours}h ${mins}m`; } else if (hours > 0) { return `${hours}h ${mins}m`; } else { return `${mins}m`; } }; if (isLoading) { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4].map((i) => (
))}
{[1, 2].map((i) => (
))}
); } if (!analytics) { return (

No analytics data available

Analytics will appear here once tasks are created

); } // Enhanced chart data with gradients and better colors const taskStatusData = { labels: ['Completed', 'In Progress', 'To Do', 'Overdue'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.completed_tasks || 0, analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, analytics.todo_tasks || 0, analytics.overdue_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.8)', // Green for completed 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.8)', // Blue for in progress 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8)', // Yellow for todo 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.8)', // Red for overdue ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 1)', 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 1)', 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 1)', 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 1)', ], borderWidth: 3, hoverOffset: 8, hoverBackgroundColor: [ 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.9)', 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.9)', 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.9)', 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.9)', ], }, ], }; // Enhanced priority data const priorityData = { labels: ['High Priority', 'Medium Priority', 'Low Priority'], datasets: [ { data: [ analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'high')?.count || 0, analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'medium')?.count || 0, analytics.tasks_by_priority?.find(p => p.priority === 'low')?.count || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.8)', // Red for high 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8)', // Yellow for medium 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.8)', // Green for low ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 1)', 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 1)', 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 1)', ], borderWidth: 3, hoverOffset: 8, }, ], }; // Enhanced progress bar data const progressData = { labels: ['Completed', 'In Progress', 'To Do', 'Overdue'], datasets: [ { label: 'Task Distribution', data: [ analytics.completed_tasks || 0, analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0, analytics.todo_tasks || 0, analytics.overdue_tasks || 0, ], backgroundColor: [ 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.7)', 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.7)', 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.7)', 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.7)', ], borderColor: [ 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 1)', 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 1)', 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 1)', 'rgba(239, 68, 68, 1)', ], borderWidth: 2, borderRadius: 8, borderSkipped: false, }, ], }; // New: Team performance data const teamPerformanceData = { labels: analytics.tasks_by_assignee?.map(assignee => assignee.assignee_name) || ['No Data'], datasets: [ { label: 'Tasks Completed', data: analytics.tasks_by_assignee?.map(assignee => assignee.completed_count) || [0], backgroundColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.8)', borderColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 1)', borderWidth: 2, borderRadius: 6, borderSkipped: false, }, { label: 'Tasks In Progress', data: analytics.tasks_by_assignee?.map(assignee => assignee.in_progress_count) || [0], backgroundColor: 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.8)', borderColor: 'rgba(245, 158, 11, 1)', borderWidth: 2, borderRadius: 6, borderSkipped: false, }, ], }; // New: Timeline data for project progress const timelineData = { labels: ['Week 1', 'Week 2', 'Week 3', 'Week 4', 'Week 5', 'Week 6'], datasets: [ { label: 'Tasks Completed', data: [2, 5, 8, 12, 15, 18], borderColor: 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 1)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.1)', borderWidth: 3, fill: true, tension: 0.4, pointBackgroundColor: 'rgba(16, 185, 129, 1)', pointBorderColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 6, pointHoverRadius: 8, }, { label: 'Tasks Created', data: [5, 8, 12, 15, 18, 20], borderColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 1)', backgroundColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1)', borderWidth: 3, fill: true, tension: 0.4, pointBackgroundColor: 'rgba(59, 130, 246, 1)', pointBorderColor: '#fff', pointBorderWidth: 2, pointRadius: 6, pointHoverRadius: 8, }, ], }; const chartOptions = { responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, plugins: { legend: { position: 'bottom', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, tooltip: { backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)', titleColor: 'white', bodyColor: 'white', borderColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1)', borderWidth: 1, }, }, }; const doughnutOptions = { ...chartOptions, cutout: '60%', plugins: { ...chartOptions.plugins, legend: { position: 'right', labels: { padding: 20, usePointStyle: true, }, }, }, }; // Check if this is project-specific analytics or general analytics const isProjectSpecific = analytics?.project || projectName; const projectData = analytics?.project; return (
{/* Header */}

{isProjectSpecific ? `${projectName || projectData?.name} Analytics` : 'Overall Analytics'}

{isProjectSpecific ? 'Project-specific insights and performance metrics' : 'Comprehensive insights across all projects' }

{isProjectSpecific && projectData && (

Project: {projectData.name} {projectData.description && ( {projectData.description} )}

)}
{/* Dashboard-style Stats Grid */}

Total Tasks

{analytics.total_tasks || 0}

Completed

In Progress

Overdue

{/* Completion Rate */}

Completion Rate

{analytics.completion_rate !== undefined ? `${analytics.completion_rate}%` : (analytics.total_tasks > 0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0) + '%'}
0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0)}%` }} >
 {/* Stats Cards */}

Total Tasks

{analytics.total_tasks || 0}

Completed

{analytics.completed_tasks || 0}

In Progress

{analytics.in_progress_tasks || 0}

Completion Rate

{analytics.completion_rate !== undefined ? `${analytics.completion_rate}%` : (analytics.total_tasks > 0 ? Math.round((analytics.completed_tasks / analytics.total_tasks) * 100) : 0) + '%'}

Team Members

{analytics.team_members || 0}
{/* Charts */}
{/* Task Status Distribution */}

Task Status Distribution

Priority Distribution

Task Status Overview
{/* Additional Metrics */}
Avg. Task Duration

{formatDuration(analytics.avg_task_duration, analytics.avg_task_duration_minutes)}

{analytics.avg_task_duration_minutes && (

{Math.round(analytics.avg_task_duration_minutes)} minutes total

)}
Overdue Tasks

{analytics.overdue_tasks || 0}
{/* Project-specific sections */} {isProjectSpecific && ( <> {/* Team Performance (Project-specific only) */} {analytics.team_performance && analytics.team_performance.length > 0 && (

Team Performance

{analytics.team_performance.map((member, index) => (

{member.name}

{member.email}

{member.completed_tasks} of {member.total_assigned} tasks completed

0 ? (member.completed_tasks / member.total_assigned) * 100 : 0}%` }} >
))}
)} {/* Recent Completed Tasks (Project-specific only) */} {analytics.recent_completed_tasks && analytics.recent_completed_tasks.length > 0 && (

Recent Completed Tasks

{analytics.recent_completed_tasks.slice(0, 5).map((task, index) => (

{task.title}

Completed by {task.completed_by} {new Date(task.completed_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{task.priority}
))}
)} {/* Project Timeline (Project-specific only) */} {projectData && (

Project Timeline

Project Start

{new Date(analytics.project_start_date || projectData.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

Last Activity

{new Date(analytics.last_activity || projectData.updated_at).toLocaleDateString()}

)} )}
); }; export default ProjectAnalytics;
